short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best companion for shopping on Craigslist and Facebook Marketplace. Easily view sold and for-sale items on eBay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the power of informed buying and selling with Baywatch, the ultimate tool for cross-platform market insights.

🔍 Comprehensive Market View: With Baywatch, effortlessly view eBay's sold and for-sale listings while browsing Craigslist and Facebook Marketplace. Compare prices, gauge demand, and make the most informed decisions.

🌉 Bridge the Platforms: No more switching between tabs or apps. Baywatch seamlessly integrates eBay data right into your Craigslist and Facebook Marketplace browsing experience.

📊 Real-Time Data: Stay ahead of the curve with real-time eBay pricing and listing data. Whether you're buying or selling, ensure you're getting the best deal by understanding the broader market.

🔒 Privacy First: We prioritize your privacy. Baywatch operates without needing access to your eBay, Craigslist, or Facebook accounts. Browse and transact with the assurance that your personal information remains yours.

🚀 Easy Installation: Just a few clicks and you're set! Add the Baywatch extension to your Chrome browser and elevate your online marketplace experience.

Dive into the world of smart e-commerce with Baywatch and never miss an opportunity again!
